item.title: Everything You Ever Wanted to Know About Digital.Grinnell Entities, but were Afraid to Ask
item.description: Digital.Grinnell used to support and use “entities”, metadata-only objects that are referential in nature. Entities are best described in this Entities Solution Pack documentation. Quoting from that resource… This module allows you to add person, place, event, and organization entities to an Islandora repository. Entities are small, metadata-based objects. A number of forms and additional features are provided in this module for those building an institutional repository with Islandora. Much of the functionality for batch ingest and autocomplete (to use entities as authority objects) centres [sic] around the MADS forms provided with the module.
